meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2079.

td.p: Chuck Geneslaw, a pediatrician from Toms River, New Jersey
Tim Sheehan, a sales rep from Exton, Pennsylvania
Dave Osborne, a television production assistant from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,199)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
THE EMMY AWARDS
THE GRAPHIC ARTS
THE HEART
FLAGS
ITALIAN 101
